document_title: Grade 1 fatty liver: Causes, signs and treatments
subsection_content:
1. Due to alcohol
There are many causes of grade 1 fatty liver. The most common cause is alcohol. Abuse of alcohol in particular and alcoholic beverages puts the liver at high risk of damage leading to inflammation, fatty liver disease or cirrhosis. Even people who drink little can still get sick; Therefore, you should not be subjective about this disease whether you drink a lot or a little alcohol.
2. Other factors
In addition to alcohol, other common factors that increase the risk of grade 1 fatty liver disease include:
Overweight, obesity; Type 2 diabetes; Genetic; Hyperlipidemia; Habit of eating a lot of foods rich in fat and oil
